title: SAM data model
content:
This page describes the SAM data model, which consists of SAM-related record types. Getting familiar with the SAM data model will help you:

  • Create SAM reports in the Service Management report module.
  • Visualize your SAM data by using the Service Management OData service (which includes the SAM data model) as a data source in one of the data visualization tools, such as Power BI.

SAM record types

The following lists the SAM-related record types.

Record type name Display name Description Available in the report module Available in the OData service
SoftwarePublisher Software publisher Software publisher X X
Product Product Product X X
ProductVersion Product version Product version X X
LicenseMetric License metric License metric X X
OrganizationComplianceScope Organization compliance scope Organization compliance scope X X
ProductCompliance Product compliance Product compliance X X
ProductVersionCompliance Product version compliance Product version compliance X X
LicenseUsage
License usage
License usage (per license model, per product version)
 X X
SamDiscoveredProduct
Discovered product
Discovered product (synced from UD/UCMDB)
 X
SamLicensePool
License summary
License summary of effective license points and consumption
 X
SamLicensePoolLicenseRelation
License summary and license relationship
The relationship between license summary and license
 X
SamNodeComplianceAnalysis
Node compliance analysis
Node compliance analysis detail
 X
SamNodeAllocatedLicense
Node allocated license
Allocated license for each node
 X
SamNode
Node
Node (synced from UD/UCMDB)
 X
SamPersonComplianceAnalysis
Person compliance analysis
Person compliance analysis detail
 X
SamPersonAllocatedLicense
Person allocated license
Allocated license for each user
 X
SamSaasUserEntitlement
SaaS user entitlement
SaaS user entitlement (synced from SaaS products)
 X

View SAM record types in Service Management Studio

For those report types that can be used in the Service Management report module, you can view their fields and field properties in Service Management Studio.

  1. From the main menu, choose Administration > Configuration > Studio.
    On the Studio page that appears, you can find the SAM record types from the drop-down list in the upper left corner.
  2. Select a SAM record type to view the related fields.
  3. Select a field to view its properties.
    The SAM fields are read-only and have the Domain property set to sam, indicating that the data is federated from SAM via UCMDB Gateway.  

SoftwarePublisher (Software Publisher)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Code Code The unique string that identifies the software publisher.
Name Name The publisher's name.
ProductEnv Production environment

Indicates that the product is detected from the production environment. 

This is available for discovered products from UD/UCMDB.
SyncTime Last synced at

The time when the product family was synchronized from UD/UCMDB.

Product (Product)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Name Name The product name.
Code Code The unique string that identifies the product.
Vendor Publisher Links to the Software Publisher record type.
Monitored Managed product Indicates that the product is being managed.
NumberOfInstances Number of instances The number of devices that have the product installed.  
ProductEnv Production environment Indicates that the product is detected from the production environment. This is available for discovered products from UD/UCMDB.
SyncTime Last synced at The time when the product family was synchronized from UD/UCMDB.
SubscriptionBased Subscription-based Indicates whether the product is a SaaS application.
CommercialModel Commercial model Specifies whether a product is commercial, freeware, or has an unknown license type

ProductVersion (Product version)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Name Name The product name.
Code Code The unique string that identifies the product.
Product Product Links to the Product record type.
VersionNumber Version number The version number of the product.
Edition Edition The edition of the product.  
Version Version The product version.
ProductEnv Production environment Indicates that the product is detected from the production environment. This is available for discovered products from UD/UCMDB.
SyncTime Last synced at The time when the product family was synchronized from UD/UCMDB.
Component Component Indicates whether the discovered software is a component of the installed software application.
NumberOfInstances Number of instances The number of devices that have the product installed.
LatestUpgrade Latest upgrade version

The latest upgrade version.

Note that the Service Management report module and the OData service currently don't support this field.
ReleaseDate Release date The release date of the product version.
CommercialModel Commercial model Specifies whether a product is commercial, freeware, or has an unknown license type

LicenseMetric (License Metric)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Code Code The unique string that identifies the license metric.
Name Name The name of the license metric.
System System Indicates whether the license metric is published as OOTB content and is read-only.
Vendor Publisher Links to the Software Publisher record type.
Description Description Description of the license metric.
GroupCIType Calculation unit

A calculation unit for license rules. The value can be Software installation, Operating system environment, Physical device, or Person.

  • Software installation:  Calculates license compliance for products licensed by installation.
  • Operating system environment:
    Calculates license compliance for products licensed by operating system environment (OSE), including physical and virtual OSEs.
  • Physical device: Calculates license compliance for products licensed by physical device.
  • Person: Calculates license compliance for products licensed by person.

OrganizationComplianceScope(Organization compliance scope)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Name Name The unique string that identifies the organization.
System System Indicates whether the organization is published as OOTB content. The OOTB value is Global.
ActiveStatus Active Indicates whether the organization is activated or not. If inactive, the system doesn't calculate compliance for the current organization.
DeviceFilterType Scope definition type for device

It can be below values:

  • LOCATION: Map organization to subset of Locations.
  • COST_CENTER: Map organization to subset of Cost centers.
  • CUSTOM_FIELD: Map organization to custom field.
DeviceOriFilter Scope definition for deviceLicFilterType

The query definition of device.
LicFilterType Scope definition type for license

It can be below values:

  • LOCATION: Map organization to subset of Locations.
  • COST_CENTER: Map organization to subset of Cost centers.
  • CUSTOM_FIELD: Map organization to custom field.
LicOriFilter Scope definition for license The query definition of license.
Description Description Description of the organization.

ProductCompliance (Product Compliance)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
Description Description Description of the product compliance result.
Product Product Links to the Product record type. It indicates the product for which the compliance result is calculated.
Compliant Compliance Indicates whether the product is compliant.
CreateTime Created at The time when the product compliance result was created.
CoveredVersion Number of versions Indicates the number of product versions deployed in the production environment.
Cost Estimated cost

The estimated cost in the product compliance result.

  • A positive value indicates that the product is compliant.
  • A negative value implies that the product is non-compliant.
CurrencyCode Currency code The currency code.
Monetary Monetary The cost value with the estimated cost and the currency code.
LatestResult Latest result Indicates the product compliance result is the latest one instead of the historical one.
OrganizationComplianceScope
 Organization compliance scope Indicates the product compliance result of the organization.
ResultFlag

Calculation status

Indicates the product calculating status:

  • Succeeded: the product compliance was successfully calculated.
  • Succeeded-No data: the product compliance was  successfully calculated. However, there's no related license and software installation detected (e.g. The product is not deployed in an organization).
  • Failed: The product compliance calculation was failed.

ProductVersionCompliance (Product Version Compliance)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The Service Management unique identifier.
Guid GUID The SAM unique identifier.
ProductCompliance Product compliance Links to the Product Compliance record type.
CreateTime Created at The time when the product version compliance result was created.
Cost Estimated cost

The estimated cost in the product compliance result.

  • A positive value indicates that the product version is compliant.
  • A negative value implies that the product version is non-compliant.
Balance Balance

The balance of effective license points and consumed license points.

  • A positive value indicates that there are remaining points after covering the corresponding installation.
  • A negative value implies that the license points are not enough to cover the corresponding installation.
CurrencyCode Currency code The currency code.
Monetary Monetary The cost value with the estimated cost and the currency code.
ProductVersion Product version Links to the Product Version record type.
LicenseMetric License metric Links to the License Metric record type.
LicensePoints Total entitlements The total effective points of the license.
ConsumptionPoints Consumption points The number of license points consumed. The sum of EntitledAndConsumedPoints and UnentitledAndConsumedPoints.
AssignedLicensePoints Points allocated The number of license points allocated to the product version.
EntitledLicensePoints Assigned entitlements The total number of license points that the user is authorized to use.
EntitledAndConsumedPoints Consumed entitlements The number of license points that are entitled to, and have been consumed by the user.
UnentitledAndConsumedPoints Unassigned entitlements consumed The total number of license points that are consumed by users who aren't authorized to use these licenses.

SamNode (Node)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
osFamily Operating system The operating system installed on the node.
processorCount Processor count The total number of processors of the node.
name Name The name of the node.
model Model The model name of the node.
extId External Id The global Id value of the node.
device Related device Links to the Service Management Device record type (using the GlobalId of Device and extId of Node).

SamPersonComplianceAnalysis (Person compliance analysis)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
personName Device owner The owner of the device.
installCount Installation count The total number of products installed on the device.
assignedLicensePoints Allocated points Allocated license points.
productVersion Product version Links to the Product Version record type.
balance Balance consumptionPoints minus assignedLicensePoints.
productVersionCompliance Product version compliance Links to the Product Version Compliance record type.
consumptionPoints Consumed points The total number of license points consumed by the person.
description Description Description.
entitledLicensePoints Entitled points The total number of license points entitled to the person.
licenseMetric License metric Links to the License Metric record type.
countable Countable Indicates this record is used to aggregate total consumed points.

SamNodeComplianceAnalysis (Node compliance analysis)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
description Description Description.
entitledLicensePoints Entitled points

The total number of license points entitled to the node.

Note that the Service Management report module and the OData service currently don't support this field.
licenseMetric License metric Links to the License Metric record type.
installCount Installation count The total number of products installed on the node.
node Device Links to the Node record type.
assignedLicensePoints Allocated points Allocated license points.
productVersion Product version Links to the Product Version record type.
balance Balance consumptionPoints minus assignedLicensePoints.
productVersionCompliance Product version compliance Links to the Product Version Compliance record type.
consumptionPoints Consumed points The total number of license points consumed by the node.
factorValue Factor value The factor value of the node as published by the publisher.
extNodeName Device name Node name (synced from UD/UCMDB).
countable Countable Indicates that this record is used to aggregate total consumed points.

SamLicensePoolLicenseRelation (License pool and license relationship)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
license License Links to the License record type.
licensePool License pool Links to the License Pool record type.

SamLicensePool (License summary)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
modifiedTime Modified time Modified time.
productVersion Product version Links to the Product Version record type.
pointsUpgradedFromLowerVersions Entitlements from lower versions Indicates how many license points are upgraded to the current version from a lower version.
balance Balance consumedLicensePoints minus availableLicensePoints.
pointsUpgradedToHigherVersions Entitlements consumed by higher versions Indicates how many license points are upgraded to a higher version from the current version.
purchasedUpgradeLicensePoints Purchased upgrade entitlements Indicates how many license points are gained through purchasing an upgrade license.
vendor Publisher Links to the Software Publisher record type.
purchasedFullLicensePoints Purchased entitlements Indicates how many license points are gained through purchasing a full license.
consumedLicensePoints Consumed entitlements The total number of license points consumed by the current version.
licenseMetric License metric Links to the License Metric record type.
availableLicensePoints Total entitlements The total effective license points, taking into account purchasedFullLicensePoints,  purchasedUpgradeLicensePoints, pointsUpgradedToHigherVersions,  and pointsUpgradedFromLowerVersions
organizationComplianceScope Organization compliance scope The license summary of the organization.

SamNodeAllocatedLicense (Node allocated license)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
license License Links to the License record type.
allocatedPoints Allocated points License points allocated to the node.
analysis Analysis Links to the Node Compliance Analysis record type.

SamPersonAllocatedLicense (Person allocated license)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
license Allocated license Links to the Service Management License record type.
allocatedPoints Allocated points License points allocated to the person.
analysis Analysis Links to the Person Compliance Analysis record type.

SamDiscoveredProduct (Discovered product)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
syncTime Last synced at The last synced datetime for the product family from UD/UCMDB.
product Product Links to the Product record type.
numberOfInstances Number of instances The total number of product instances synced from UD/UCMDB.
productEnv Production environment

Indicates whether the software exists in the production environment.

This is available for discovered products from UD/UCMDB.
code Code Code
eosDate End of support date End of support date for the software. This value is synced from UD/UCMDB.
vendor Publisher Links to the Software Publisher record type.
normProductVersion Normalized product version Links to the Product Version record type.
version Version Software version. This value is synced from UD/UCMDB.
extendedEosDate Extended end of support date Extended end of support date. This value is synced from UD/UCMDB.
versionNumber Version number The version number of the software. This value is synced from UD/UCMDB.

SamSaasUserEntitlement (SaaS user entitlement)

Field Display name Description
guid GUID The unique identifier.
productVersion Product version Links to the Product Version record type.
userSmaxStatus Person status The Service Management person status.
lastLoginDate Last login date The last login date for accessing the product.
userName Username Username.
userPrincipalName User principal name The system identifies the Service Management user by using this field.

LicenseUsage (License usage)

Field Display name Description
Id Id The unique identifier.
AssetModel License model Links to the Asset Model record type.
ProductVersionGuid Product version GUID The product version GUID from the Product Version record type.
ProductVersion Product version The product version name from the Product Version record type.
LicenseMetricGuid License metric GUID The license metric GUID from the License Metric record type.
LicenseMetric License metric The license metric name from the License Metric record type.
ProductGuid Product GUID The product GUID from the Product record type.
Product Product The product name from the Product record type.
PurchasedFullLicensePoints Purchased entitlements The total purchased license points for the current product version (per license model).
PurchasedUpgradeLicensePoints Purchased upgrade entitlements The total purchased upgrade license points for the current product version (per license model).
PointsUpgradedToHigherVersions Entitlements consumed by higher versions Indicates how many license points are upgraded to a higher version from the current version.
LicensePoints Total entitlements The total effective license points for the current product version (per license model).
ConsumtionPoints Consumed entitlements The total consumed license points for the current product version (per license model).
Balance Balance

The balance of effective license points and consumed license points.

  • A positive value indicates that there are remaining points after covering the corresponding installation.
  • A negative value implies that the license points are not enough to cover the corresponding installation.
EntitledLicensePoints Assigned entitlements

The total number of license points that the users are authorized to use.

This is available for products with user-based licensing.
EntitledAndConsumedPoints Consumed entitlements

The number of license points that are entitled to, and have been consumed by the user.

This is available for products with user-based licensing.
UnentitledAndConsumedPoints Unassigned entitlements consumed

The total number of license points that are consumed by users who aren't authorized to use these licenses.

This is available for products with user-based licensing.
Cost Estimated cost

The estimated cost in the product compliance result.

  • A positive value indicates that the product is compliant.
  • A negative value implies that the product is non-compliant.
CurrencyCode Currency The currency code.
ProductComplianceGuid Product compliance GUID The product compliance GUID from the Product Compliance record type.
ProductVersionComplianceGuid Product version compliance GUID The product version compliance GUID from the Product Version Compliance record type.
LatestUpgrade Latest upgrade version Indicates if the current product version is the latest (based on the products installed in the environment).
CalculationTime Calculated at Indicates when the compliance for the product was calculated.
Code Code Auto-generated unique code.
OrgComplianceScopeName Organization compliance scope name The corresponding organization name.
OrgComplianceScopeGuid Organization compliance scope GUID The corresponding organization GUID from the Organization compliance scope record type.

SAM data models

The following lists the different categories of SAM data models.

Category Data model
Product family
License summary
Compliance analysis (device-based)

Make sure the relationship between the SamNode and Device record types can be recognized by your data visualization tool. Otherwise, you need to manually establish the relationship.
Compliance analysis (user-based)
License usage

Note: The dotted lines indicate that they are not real links, which means that the links are used only to retrieve relevant information from the target record types. For example, retrieving LicenseMetricGuid from the Id value of the License Metric record type.
SaaS user entitlement
